descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a diagonal line of a single color, with gray squares extending out from one or both sides of it.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is identical to the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...keep the original colored line.  Place a square of that same color on the black square that at the point of the gray extension.  Now extend another diagonal line out from that colored square, mimicking the original line.  Do this on both sides if there are two gray extensions.  Your should now have two or three lines, including the original.  Now recolor the gray squares black, and you're done!.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... the first grid the middle red squares.1 Box down and go to the following corner 1 box over. Gray fill behind. The second Chart the burgundy row  begins in the top right corner starting fifth box on top and goes til it hits the corner. 3rd chart the orange goes corner to corner.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is 10x10 stays the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...In the input, you should see...For each input starting with the first grid copy the middle red squares. The second Chart copy only the burgundy row and add a burgundy row exactly like the middle red squares.For the orange grid copy exactly that row but add how the burgundy top row was but the exception is start the grid in the sixth box from the top left corner. No gray backgrounds.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a single color with grey color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as original color
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...keep the original diagonal color and fill the grey color with black. copy the same diagonal color on the grey color side by keeping space number of original square size make by grey color.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a diagonal line with a single color with gray squares on one side or both sides of the line on a large black background.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the input grid. Then create a diagonal line with the same color as the original diagonal line at the side of the gray squares. The diagonal line has to touch two sides of the large black background. Then, color the gray squares with black color.
